name: Space Mayhem
description:
POWERUPS AND WEAPONSUse powerups such as shotguns, shields, mines, bombs and many more to survive a bit longer. Be careful, however, ammo is limited for powerups and your main weapon runs the chance of overheating.

BEAT YOUR FRIENDS WITH YOUR CRAZY HIGH SCOREIncrease your score multiplier by defeating enemies. Keep it by avoiding damage. Keep that up and you'll be able to impress your friends and colleges with your massive high score.

BUY NEW SHIPSWhen you blow up an enemy, they might drop money for you to collect. Use it to buy yourself a new ship. Each one has different stats which will require different play styles.

INFINITE WAVES OF VARYING ENEMIESBattle against an ever increasing horde of enemies from drillers to giant bomb carrying battleships.

DESIGNED FOR MAXIMUM FUNSpace Mayhem is meant to be a simple game to give you minutes or hours of joy. It has easy controls that anyone can use but if you put in the time, you will be rewarded.
